cause.description:
This Cause is very very important!it will help all those girls out their who have identity crises about their sex.. it helps resolve confusion and allows the girl to emerge into this vile, sexist world...as a pure gentle, flower loving female
1. Females are meant to be females
2. Males must stay males
3. Pink is the new Black and netball is the new soccer!!
4. dresses, skirts and ballet pumps to take over shorts, pants and *ahem* takkies!
5. Hair must be brushed
cause.mission: Turn Iman from Tomboy to Pure Female and help other girls with such mental problems to follow suit
cause.name: Save Iman and Turn Her Into A Girl
